segments.text: Tom , hi , this is Mary with Gold Star Mortgage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'd like you to come to work for us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . I'm sorry but I just accepted another offer which I feel is better suited to my needs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really appreciate the offer , but I must decline it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please call us if you change your mind .
segments.speaker: S1
